00042   Stream :: Stream()
00043   {
00044     mStream = 0;
00045     mDirection = INBOUND;
00046     mCoder = 0;
00047     mContainer = 0;
00048     mLastDts = Global::NO_PTS;
00049   }
00050 
00051   Stream :: ~Stream()
00052   {
00053     reset();
00054   }
00055 
00056   void
00057   Stream :: reset()
00058   {
00059     VS_ASSERT("should be a valid object", getCurrentRefCount() >= 1);
00060     mMetaData.reset();
00061     // As of recent (March 2011) builds of FFmpeg, Stream objects
00062     // are cleaned up by the new avformat_free_context method in the
00063     // Container, so the outbound check for freeing memory is no
00064     // longer required.
00065     VS_REF_RELEASE(mCoder);
00066     mStream = 0;
00067     // We don't keep a reference to the container to avoid a ref-count loop
00068     // and so we don't release.
00069     mContainer = 0;
00070   }
00071   Stream*
00072   Stream :: make(Container *container, AVStream * aStream, Direction direction)
00073   {
00074     // note: make will acquire this for us.
00075     Stream *newStream = 0;
00076     if (aStream) {
00077       try {
00078         newStream = make();
00079         newStream->mStream = aStream;
00080         newStream->mDirection = direction;
00081   
00082         newStream->mCoder = StreamCoder::make(
00083               direction == INBOUND?IStreamCoder::DECODING :
00084               IStreamCoder::ENCODING,
00085               aStream->codec,
00086               newStream);
00087         newStream->mContainer = container;
00088       } catch (std::bad_alloc & e) {
00089         VS_REF_RELEASE(newStream);
00090         throw e;
00091       }
00092     }
00093     return newStream;
00094   }

00188   int
00189   Stream :: containerClosed(Container *)
00190   {
00191     // let the coder know we're closed.
00192     if (mCoder)
00193       mCoder->streamClosed(this);
00194     reset();
00195     return 0;
00196   }

00199   Stream :: acquire()
00200   {
00201     int retval = 0;
00202     retval = RefCounted::acquire();
00203     VS_LOG_TRACE("Acquired %p: %d", this, retval);
00204     return retval;
00205   }

00271   int32_t
00272   Stream :: setStreamCoder(IStreamCoder *coder)
00273   {
00274     return setStreamCoder(coder, true);
00275   }
00276   int32_t
00277   Stream :: setStreamCoder(IStreamCoder *aCoder, bool assumeOnlyStream)
00278   {
00279     int32_t retval = -1;
00280     try
00281     {
00282       if (mCoder && mCoder->isOpen())
00283         throw std::runtime_error("cannot call setStreamCoder when current coder is open");
00284       
00285       if (!aCoder)
00286         throw std::runtime_error("cannot set to a null stream coder");
00287 
00288       StreamCoder *coder = dynamic_cast<StreamCoder*>(aCoder);
00289       if (!coder)
00290         throw std::runtime_error("IStreamCoder is not of expected underlying C++ type");
00291 
00292       // Close the old stream coder
00293       if (mCoder)
00294       {
00295         mCoder->streamClosed(this);
00296       }
00297 
00298       if (coder->setStream(this, assumeOnlyStream) < 0)
00299         throw std::runtime_error("IStreamCoder doesn't like this stream");
00300 
00301       VS_REF_RELEASE(mCoder);
00302       mCoder = coder;
00303       VS_REF_ACQUIRE(mCoder);
00304       retval = 0;
00305     }
00306     catch (std::exception & e)
00307     {
00308       VS_LOG_ERROR("Error: %s", e.what());
00309       retval = -1;
00310     }
00311     return retval;
00312   }

00321     }

00325   Stream :: setParseType(IStream::ParseType type)
00326   {
00327     if (mStream) {
00328       mStream->need_parsing = (enum AVStreamParseType)type;
00329     }
00330   }
00331   
00332   IMetaData*
00333   Stream :: getMetaData()
00334   {
00335     if (!mMetaData && mStream)
00336     {
00337       if (mDirection == IStream::OUTBOUND)
00338         mMetaData = MetaData::make(&mStream->metadata);
00339       else
00340         // make a read-only copy so when libav deletes the
00341         // input version we don't delete our copy
00342         mMetaData = MetaData::make(mStream->metadata);
00343     }
00344     return mMetaData.get();
00345   }
00346   
00347   void
00348   Stream :: setMetaData(IMetaData * copy)
00349   {
00350     MetaData* data = dynamic_cast<MetaData*>(getMetaData());
00351     if (data) {
00352       data->copy(copy);
00353       // release for the get above
00354       data->release();
00355     }
00356     return;
00357   }

00359   int32_t
00360   Stream :: stampOutputPacket(IPacket* packet)
00361   {
00362     if (!packet)
00363       return -1;
00364 
00365 //    VS_LOG_DEBUG("input:  duration: %lld; dts: %lld; pts: %lld;",
00366 //        packet->getDuration(), packet->getDts(), packet->getPts());
00367 
00368     // Always just reset this; cheaper than checking if it's
00369     // already set
00370     packet->setStreamIndex(this->getIndex());
00371     
00372     com::xuggle::ferry::RefPointer<IRational> thisBase = getTimeBase();
00373     com::xuggle::ferry::RefPointer<IRational> packetBase = packet->getTimeBase();
00374     if (!thisBase || !packetBase)
00375       return -1;
00376     if (thisBase->compareTo(packetBase.value()) == 0) {
00377 //      VS_LOG_DEBUG("Same timebase: %d/%d vs %d/%d",
00378 //          thisBase->getNumerator(), thisBase->getDenominator(),
00379 //          packetBase->getNumerator(), packetBase->getDenominator());
00380       // it's already got the right time values
00381       return 0;
00382     }
00383     
00384     int64_t duration = packet->getDuration();
00385     int64_t dts = packet->getDts();
00386     int64_t pts = packet->getPts();
00387     
00388     if (duration >= 0)
00389       duration = thisBase->rescale(duration, packetBase.value(),
00390           IRational::ROUND_DOWN);
00391     
00392     if (pts != Global::NO_PTS)
00393     {
00394       pts = thisBase->rescale(pts, packetBase.value(), IRational::ROUND_DOWN);
00395     }
00396     if (dts != Global::NO_PTS)
00397     {
00398       dts = thisBase->rescale(dts, packetBase.value(), IRational::ROUND_DOWN);
00399       if (mLastDts != Global::NO_PTS && dts == mLastDts)
00400       {
00401         // adjust for rounding; we never want to insert a frame that
00402         // is not monotonically increasing.  Note we only do this if
00403         // we're off by one; that's because we ROUND_DOWN and then assume
00404         // that can be off by at most one.  If we're off by more than one
00405         // then it's really an error on the person muxing to this stream.
00406         dts = mLastDts+1;
00407         // and round up pts
00408         if (pts != Global::NO_PTS)
00409           ++pts;
00410         // and if after all that adjusting, pts is less than dts
00411         // let dts win.
00412         if (pts == Global::NO_PTS || pts < dts)
00413           pts = dts;
00414       }
00415       mLastDts = dts;
00416     }
00417     
00418 //    VS_LOG_DEBUG("output: duration: %lld; dts: %lld; pts: %lld;",
00419 //        duration, dts, pts);
00420     packet->setDuration(duration);
00421     packet->setPts(pts);
00422     packet->setDts(dts);
00423     packet->setTimeBase(thisBase.value());
00424 //    VS_LOG_DEBUG("Reset timebase: %d/%d",
00425 //        thisBase->getNumerator(), thisBase->getDenominator());
00426     return 0;
00427   }

00429   IIndexEntry*
00430   Stream :: findTimeStampEntryInIndex(int64_t wantedTimeStamp, int32_t flags)
00431   {
00432     int32_t index = findTimeStampPositionInIndex(wantedTimeStamp, flags);
00433     // getIndexEntry will check for a negative index and return null if so
00434     return getIndexEntry(index);
00435   }
00436   int32_t
00437   Stream :: findTimeStampPositionInIndex(int64_t wantedTimeStamp,
00438       int32_t flags)
00439   {
00440     int retval = -1;
00441     if (mStream) {
00442       retval = av_index_search_timestamp(
00443           mStream,
00444           wantedTimeStamp,
00445           flags);
00446     }
00447     return retval;
00448   }
00449 
00450   IIndexEntry*
00451   Stream :: getIndexEntry(int32_t index)
00452   {
00453     IIndexEntry* retval = 0;
00454     if (mStream->index_entries
00455         && index >= 0
00456         && index < mStream->nb_index_entries)
00457     {
00458       AVIndexEntry* entry = &(mStream->index_entries[index]);
00459       if (entry) {
00460         retval = IIndexEntry::make(
00461             entry->pos,
00462             entry->timestamp,
00463             entry->flags,
00464             entry->size,
00465             entry->min_distance
00466         );
00467       }
00468     }
00469     return retval;
00470   }
00471   int32_t
00472   Stream :: addIndexEntry(IIndexEntry* entry)
00473   {
00474     if (!entry)
00475       return -1;
00476     if (!mStream)
00477       return -1;
00478     return av_add_index_entry(mStream,
00479         entry->getPosition(),
00480         entry->getTimeStamp(),
00481         entry->getSize(),
00482         entry->getMinDistance(),
00483         entry->getFlags());
00484   }
